title.rendered: Circle Cutter Compass Tool for Paper Crafts, Fabric | Create Circles from 10mm to 150mm, Big Size(Pack of 1)

content.rendered: Circle Cutter comes with 3 extremely sharp blades. Cuts Circles from 10mm to 150mm diameter.Very useful tool for scrapbooking, paper crafts and card making Multi-function- All kinds of circles can be cut and the circle. You can also remove the blade and replace it with a pencil holder for general use of the compass knife. Convenient to Use- Safety cover keeps blade and pivot pin covered for safety when not in use. It is great for scrap booking, photo cropping, die cutting, plotting and more. There’s a small storage box on the top of it, you can store replaceable leads on it. Adjustable- Compass cutter is a convenient tool for cutting or drawing perfect circles effective cutting range can be up to 10-150mm. Easy to Carry- Designed with durable yet lightweight materials and a slim profile, an easily portable tool that can be carried around in a small bag or purse. Wide Application—It is useful for a variety of hobby and craft projects cuts paper, film, leather, vinyl, fabric, plastics, rubber and more.

excerpt.rendered:
Cuts Circles from 10mm to 150mm Diameter Dimensions: 12mm~300mm. Circle Cutter Easy to use circle cutter to cut perfect round shapes in paper or photos

Combination circle cutter compass has extended beam that sets slide rule with accuracy

Great for Scrap-booking, Paper Crafts & CardmakingWith the fixator, it can enlarge the useful cutting area and use easily.

Cutting-Compass , Circle Cutter. For circular cuts from 1 to 15 cm. Can be used on paper, vinyl sheets, film, acetate, cardboard, light wood, and other thin materials

With the paper protector, you can cut paper without destroying it.
